item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Saturday, August 31, 2024 at 10:15 PM UTC
item.description:

7. Compilation of JavaScript to WASM, Part 2: Ahead-of-Time vs. JIT (41 points | discuss)
8. Continue (YC S23) Is Hiring a Software Engineer in San Francisco ( | hide)

10. Landlords Face a $1.5T Commercial Real Estate Maturity Wall (23 points | 1 comment)
11. Lucee: A light-weight dynamic CFML scripting language for the JVM (48 points | 18 comments)

21. Buy, Borrow, Die – Explained (218 points | 161 comments)

25. Seeing America by train (83 points | 65 comments)
26. Rediscovering the Small Web (2020) (218 points | 52 comments)
27. Federal Appeals Court Once Again Rejects Blanket Gun Ban for Cannabis Consumers (11 points | 2 comments)

29. AnandTech Farewell (2883 points | 579 comments)
